text: is a Japanese ski jumper. During the 2018–19 season, he won thirteen World Cup events and won all six possible titles in the World Cup season: overall title, ski flying title, Four Hills Tournament, Raw Air, Planica7, and Willingen Five. He is the third ski jumper in the history to win all four competitions in the Four Hills Tournament. ==Results== ===Winter Olympic Games=== Year Place Team LH Mixed NH 2018 Pyeongchang 7 10 6 N/A 2022
